properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 9:10AM CST until February 23 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Sucarnoochee River At Livingston Affecting Sumter County.

.Rises are occurring on the Sucarnoochee River following recent
heavy rainfall...and a flood warning is now in effect at Livingston.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Sucarnoochee River At Livingston.
* from Friday afternoon to Sunday morning...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At  8:30 AM Thursday The stage Was 11.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 18 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Friday afternoon and
continue to rise to near 18.5 feet by Saturday morning. The river
will fall below flood stage by Saturday night.
* Impact...At 18 feet...Flooding of farm lands around Livinsgton
occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
